data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,172,400 souls in Gopalganj and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gopalganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Gopalganj an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Gopalganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Gopalganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, remind your church in Gopalganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Over 99.57 percent of the people of Gopalganj are far from Jesus.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Gopalganj, Dhaka, Bangladesh. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Gopalganj
location.people_groups_list: Hazra (Muslim traditions), Mandala (Hindu traditions), Mandala (Muslim traditions), Jamadar, Kaghazi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hazra (Muslim traditions) (800), Mandala (Hindu traditions) (7,700), Mandala (Muslim traditions) (105,000), Jamadar (300), Kaghazi (2,200)
